div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1848 Rajjar, near Charsadda (anc. Peuco- laotis), Gandhara, Pakistan, before 1946 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. ? (Le Rider) Contents: AE Menander Polyxenus Lysias Diomedes Kadaphes Taxila Disposition: unknown Haughton, NC 1946, p. 144 Not certainly a hd.
